name: Tree Planting Simulator
description:
This is a game about planting trees

Hit $5000 To Win

WARNING THIS GAME DOES NOT SAVE

The Apple Tree:

This tree doesn't sell for much but has the added benefit of creating apples. all apples harvested can be sold when the apple truck comes.

                                                         

Red Apples sell for $20, Green Apples sell for $30, and Yellow Apples sell for $50

The Birch Tree:

This Tree is an average tree it grows at a average speed and sells for a average amount

The Spruce Tree:

This Tree is a big slow tree that will sell for more then the other trees

The Jungle Tree:

This tree is a fast growing tree that will sell for less then most other trees

The Maple Tree:

This tree creates Syrup which can be sold for $30 on the right side but you can only hold 1 bucket of syrup at a time
